title: Parish sheriff office- Public records request- Cameron Oliver

communications.subject: Louisiana Public Records Law Request: Parish sheriff office- Public records request- Cameron Oliver
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Louisiana Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Good day.
 I hope you are doing well. 
I am requesting the following records from your agency. 
Can you please provide a list of deputies currently employed by the sheriff office- by name and rank.
 Also, by District/time period. 
Drug crimes possession of all illegal drugs. 
I want a list of the suspects'  drugs charges and the deputy  who made the arrest.
 I want crime data on this crime from the years 2022-2025.
 Also, a list of the most frequent crimes your community faces.
 
Let me know if you have any questions or concerns. 

I look forward to hearing from you. 
Thank you for your time and consideration. 
Take care and be well.
 

Best regards,
 Cameron Oliver
 904-489-9118
 oliverkidsjax@gmail.com

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Cameron John Oliver
